entries.name: sender()
entries.desc: Returns the binding context of the caller from the last frame initialized

entries.name: bottom(n = 0)
entries.desc: Returns the n number of frames on the call stack from the first frame initialized.

entries.name: top(n = 0)
entries.desc: Returns the n number of frames on the call stack from the last frame initialized.

entries.name: trace_func(event, file, line, id, binding)
entries.desc: Used by Kernel#set_trace_func to register each event in the call stack
